title: (Tues Full) We Say Goodbye to Amy! + Is A Listener Going On A Date with a Married Co-Worker? + Fights At Kids Sporting Events
itunes:title: (Tues Full) We Say Goodbye to Amy! + Is A Listener Going On A Date with a Married Co-Worker? + Fights At Kids Sporting Events
description:
We give a farewell to Amy as she leaves to shoot her movie in Hollywood! Bobby got so many messages about the Courtney from Arizona situation. She called in last week saying she was going on a first date with a guy but some things just didn’t add up…now listeners are speculating why. Bobby shares a story about an umpire who got punched by an angry parent at a kid’s softball game. Callers share stories of what they saw happened at youth games.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
